properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Glory, glory, glory to the Lord
Glory, glory, glory to the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When in time of plenty,
When in time of need
When I'm tired and weary
When there is victory

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sometimes when I'm singing,
Even if I cry
Sometimes when I celebrate
Even if I die

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I praise Him when I'm weak or strong
My father can deliver me
He's in my heart and I'm in His
There's no place else I'd rather be
No place else I'd rather be
